Concordance Table: S3 to S2

Source: R/data.R
S3_S2.Rd

Concordance table from SITC Rev.3 (S3) and SITC Rev.2 (S2). Product descriptions taken fromm WITS' HS combined concordance tables (https://wits.worldbank.org/product_concordance.html).

S3_S2

Format

A data frame with 3,121 rows and 4 variables:

SITC Revision 3 Product Code

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Rev.3 (S3) Product code.

SITC Revision 3 Product Description

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Rev.3 (S3) Product description.

SITC Revision 2 Product Code

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Rev.2 (S2) Product code.

SITC Revision 2 Product Description

Standard International Trade Classification SITC Rev.2 (S2) Product description.

Source

https://wits.worldbank.org/product_concordance.html

Examples

S3_S2

#> # A tibble: 3,121 x 4
#>    `SITC Revision 3 ~ `SITC Revision 3 P~ `SITC Revision 2~ `SITC Revision 2 Pr~
#>    <chr>              <chr>               <chr>             <chr>               
#>  1 00111              Bovine animals, br~ 00111             Bovine species pure~
#>  2 00119              Bovine animals, ot~ 00119             Bovine species othe~
#>  3 00121              Sheep,live          00121             Sheep, live         
#>  4 00122              Goats,live          00122             Goats, live         
#>  5 00131              Swine, live for br~ 0013              Swine, live         
#>  6 00139              Swine, live, other  0013              Swine, live         
#>  7 00141              Poultry,live,max 1~ 00141             Poultry,live of a w~
#>  8 00149              Poultry live,over ~ 00149             Poultry,live of a w~
#>  9 00151              Horses              0015              Horses, asses, mule~
#> 10 00152              Asses/mules/hinnie~ 0015              Horses, asses, mule~
#> # ... with 3,111 more rows
